name: HR Network
description: HR NETWORK was borne out of a need by business and industry for highly focused and strictly confidential search. This results in the hiring of effective, successful, and top-notch professionals. The company is a brain child of a group of highly competent young professionals with proven track record in the field of Human Resources Management practice. They share a common vision of becoming the “new breed” in human resources management and development consulting. Established in August 1999, HR Network’s executive search services of exacting standards are availed of by a wide range of local and multinational companies specifically in the IT industry. HR Network’s consultants come from a solid foundation in the HR practice with extensive exposure in sourcing and screening of high caliber people. They enable the firm to provide timely and quality service for every executive search assignment.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Where jobs and professionals are found.
ShortDescription: HR NETWORK was borne out of a need by business and industry for highly focused and strictly confidential search. This results in the hiring of effective, successful, and top-notch professionals.
enhanced_description: HR Network is a seasoned HR consulting and executive search firm, established in August 1999, specializing in highly focused and strictly confidential talent acquisition services. Their core mission is to enable businesses and industries, particularly within the IT sector, to hire effective, successful, and top-notch professionals, addressing the critical need to acquire top talent faster and more efficiently. Beyond executive search, HR Network extends its expertise to comprehensive HR management and development consulting, offering services such as Performance Management Systems, Employee Development Training Programs, and Organizational Climate Surveys. The firm prides itself on its team of highly competent consultants with a solid foundation in HR practice and extensive exposure to sourcing and screening high-caliber individuals, ensuring timely and quality service for every client engagement.

Developing and delivering employee training programs
Conducting organizational climate surveys to assess workplace dynamics
